description: Configuration file defining a biome for a data pack for Minecraft.

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Used for terrain noise generation. Biomes with positive depth are considered land, biomes with negative depth are oceans.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Used for terrain noise generation. Vertically stretches the terrain. Lower values produce flatter terrain.

precipitation.title: Precipitation
precipitation.description: The type of precipitation found in this biome. If snow, rabbits spawning in this biome will be white or black-and-white.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls gameplay features like grass and foliage color and whether snow golems take damage.

downfall.title: Downfall
downfall.description: Controls grass and foliage color, a value above 0.85 also makes fire burn out faster.

creature_spawn_friendly.title: Creature Spawn Friendly
creature_spawn_friendly.description: Spawns passive mobs as long as random value is less than this.

fog_color.title: Fog Color
fog_color.description: Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for fog.

foliage_color.title: Foliage Color
foliage_color.description: Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for tree leaves and vines. If not present, the value depends on humidity and temperature.

grass_color.title: Grass Color
grass_color.description: Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for grass blocks, grass, tall grass, ferns, tall ferns, and sugar cane. If not present, the value depends on humidity and temperature.

sky_color.title: Sky Color
sky_color.description: Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for the sky.

water_color.title: Water Color
water_color.description: Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for water blocks and cauldrons.

water_fog_color.title: Water Fog Color
water_fog_color.description: Decimal value converted from Hex color to use for fog.

particle.title: Particle
particle.description: The particle to use throughout this biome.

probability.title: Probability
probability.description: Controls how often the particle spawns.

ambient_sound.title: Ambient Sound
ambient_sound.description: Sound event to use for ambient sound.

block_search_context.title: Block Search Context
block_search_context.description: Determines the cubic range of possible positions to play the mood sound. The player is at the center of the cubic range, and the edge length is 2 * block_search_extent + 1.

music.title: Music
music.description: Specific music that should be played in the biome.

replace_current_music.title: Replace Current Music
replace_current_music.description: Whether or not to replace music which is already playing.

surface_builder.title: Surface Builder
surface_builder.description: The namespaced id of the configured surface builder to use.

air.title: Air
air.description: List of carvers used during the air generation step.

items.description: The namespaced id of a configured carver.

liquid.title: Liquids
liquid.description: List of carvers used during the liquid generation step

items.description: The namespaced id of a configured carver.

features.title: Features
features.description: A list of 10 lists of features. In vanilla, each of the 10 lists corresponds to a different type of feature: the feature lists are applied to each chunk in order from top to bottom. The index of the list which the feature is placed in is also used to generate part of the feature seed, so moving features to a different list definitely has some effect on generation. Each element of each list is a namespaced ID of a configured feature. Can be a empty list.

starts.title: Starts
starts.description: The structures to generate in this biome.

items.description: The namespaced ID of a configured structure feature.

title: Minecraft Data Pack Biome
